title: BRIEF-India's Reliance Naval Reports Loss, Lower Revenue In Sept Quarter
text:
BRIEF-India's Reliance Naval Reports Loss, Lower Revenue In Sept Quarter

Stock Markets 5 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 14:13)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Reliance Naval Reports Loss, Lower Revenue In Sept Quarter Oct 24 (Reuters) - Reliance Naval and Engineering Ltd : * SEPT-QUARTER CONSOL NET LOSS AFTER TAX 3.75 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS LOSS OF 3.8 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT-QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 205.6 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 576.4 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO

BRIEF-India's Reliance Naval Reports Loss, Lower Revenue In Sept Quarter
